\- Flavor Description: Warm and Baked. Thin, Dark Maple\* Syrup (Upfront) mixed with Rich notes of Roasted, Natural Nutty Pecan and Mild Notes of a Dry Graham Cracker like ‚ÄúPie Crust‚Äù. Overall flavor is dusted with subtle Cinnamon. Medium Bodied with a Rounded, Light Drying Mouthfeel.

‚ñ∫ Notes

\- Off Notes: No Identifiable Off Notes

\- Overall flavor is well Balanced and Aromatic ‚Ä¢ Maple is not overpowering or aggressive ‚Ä¢ Cinnamon note found in Pie Crust ‚Äì not Red Hots

\- Notes of ‚ÄúVanilla‚Äù stated in Flavor Description not easily Identifiable over Maple Flvr.

\- Uses: Pastries & Bakeries
